Rest Interface¶

channel_info¶

Returns all settings and attributes of a channel.

Form Variables:

  • secret: The password specified in the config as -r or --rest-secret.
  • channel_name: The target channel.

Returns json:

[ success (boolean) , details (object) ]

Example:

Client Requests URL:

/rest/channel_info?secret=yo&channel_name=testing

Server Replies:

[
    true,
    {
        "name": "testing",
        "options": {
            "anonymous": false,
            "history": [
                [
                    "SUBSCRIBE",
                    {
                        "user": "mcarter"
                    }
                ],
                [
                    "PUBLISH",
                    {
                        "payload": "good day",
                        "user": "mcarter"
                    }
                ],
                [
                    "PUBLISH",
                    {
                        "payload": "was gibt es?",
                        "user": "mcarter"
                    }
                ]
            ],
            "history_size": 5,
            "moderated": false,
            "moderated_publish": true,
            "moderated_subscribe": true,
            "moderated_unsubscribe": true,
            "polling": {
                "form": {},
                "interval": 5,
                "mode": "",
                "originator": "",
                "url": ""
            },
            "presenceful": true,
            "reflective": true
        },
        "subscribers": [
            "mcarter"
        ]
    }
]
